name: Ice Jump
description:
=DESCRIPTION=

A small game I made in 3 days. In this game, you play as Mike who is trapped on the piece of ice that float on a lake. But the ice is melting! So you have to jump on the ice tiles until they break. But somehow, there's a restart button that spawns new, unfrozen ice below you, so you can live here eternally. You technically can, but will you survive there?

=CONTROLS=

<- - move left

-> - move right

[SPACE] - jump

=GAMEPLAY=

You have to jump away from melting ice (it melts suddenly, without any indicator), and you have to collect  to reload the entire ice layer
